column4: Hi guys some money matters : i have been using a lot of free/open source programs for my job and for business purpose. I didn't pay anything so far. But these programs are fantastic. For example : Ubuntu OS, Openoffice, XMMS, Bluefish... etc etc. Anyone knows who is paying for the development and other expenses? I was wondering !!!
I see. Thank you guys. So how can I do some help with these projects? I am not a full time developer. My job is sales.
Its so amazing that some programs are much better than those paid ones !!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!
there are non-coding tasks too -- see that web page
